description:
Marcus Octavius was leading the Roman army through Scotland when he was first killed (that is shown) by Moya. Moya is later crucified and witnesses her clan being destroyed. Colin finds her before her death and swears revenge on Marcus. Through various encounters he repeatedly gets killed, however due to various reasons is not beheaded.
Marcus` date of birth and age are unknown. He is however, at least 2000 years old.
name: Marcus Octavius
